title: New Testament blackletter
content:
Does anybody have know what font this is? Or does anybody know of a similar font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120424140030im_/http:/typophile.com/files/new_4124.gif)
author: zap_rowsdower

comments.content: I just went through the entire blackletter section in FontBook and there's nothing to be found there. :/

Yeah, this is a tough one. I would say handlettered, weren’t the 3 ‘e’ so similar …  
 [Beckett-Kanzlei](http://web.archive.org/web/20120424140030/http:/www.moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/steffmann/samples/b/beckettk.htm) is the only one I found that has a similar basic construction of the caps – but it still is waaay off.
